title: Baby girl
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Chrissy Ponting
brief_description: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.
description: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.
